com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.robot

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.entity.Entity
      • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.physicalObject.PhysicalObject
        • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.robot.Robot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkConnectionListener, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeltaRobot3, DHRobot, RotaryStewartPlatform, Spidee

    public abstract class Robot
extends PhysicalObject
implements NetworkConnectionListener
    A robot visible with a physical presence in the World. Assumed to have an NetworkConnection to a machine in real life.
    Author:
    Dan Royer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • lineError

        public void lineError(NetworkConnection arg0,
                      int lineNumber)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkConnectionListener
        Transmission of message number 'lineNumber' has failed on a NetworkConnection.
        Specified by:
        lineError in interface NetworkConnectionListener
        Parameters:
        arg0 - connection involved
        lineNumber - the number of the command line sent that failed to receive. all messages after this point will also fail until this line is resent.
